channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ravens QB Lamar Jackson Absent From Wednesday's Practice With Back Injury
item.description: Lamar Jackson did not practice Wednesday for the Baltimore Ravens because of his back injury

item.title: John Robertson, a 2-Time European Cup Winner With Nottingham Forest, Dies
item.description: John Robertson, a former Scotland winger who won the European Cup twice with Nottingham Forest and scored the only goal in the 1980 final, has died

item.title: Washington's Denzel Boston, One of CFB's Top WRs, Declares For NFL Draft
item.description: FOX Sports NFL Draft expert Rob Rang has Denzel Boston getting selected in the first round of the 2026 NFL Draft.

item.description: Discover the best sportsbook promos and bonus bets for December 2025. Compare welcome offers and top bonuses from leading betting sites.

item.title: Cards' Sweat irked by 'frustrating' Pro Bowl snub
item.description: Cardinals edge rusher Josh Sweat did not hold back his disappointment Wednesday in being named a Pro Bowl alternate this week.

item.title: Hawai'i caps rally with last-minute TD to stun Cal
item.description: Hawai'i rallied for a 35-31 victory over California in the Sheraton Hawai'i Bowl.

item.title: WR Rice among four Chiefs players placed on IR
item.description: Chiefs wide receiver Rashee Rice's 2025 season began with a suspension and now will end on injured reserve.
